articles.title: Govt tells agencies to coordinate crackdown on Chinese firms as it has 'security concerns' too - ThePrint
articles.description: Some firms registered in India but 'taking instructions from China' said to have data saved in cloud servers, where information on Indian entities’ accounts is shared with Chinese parent firms.
